sourcesContent:
import { Navbar, Container, Form, Col, Row, InputGroup, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Formik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEye } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import GlobalStyleSheet from '../styleSheet'; import Link from 'next/link'; const schema = yup.object({ mobile: yup.string().required("Mobile number is required") .min(14, "Mobile number must have at least 14 number") .max(15, "Mobile number can't be longer than 15 number"), name: yup.string().required("Full Name is required") .min(5, "Full Name must have at least 5 characters") .max(20, "Full Name can't be longer than 20 characters"), verificationCode: yup.string().required("Verification Code is required"), email: yup.string(), password: yup.string().required("Password is required") .min(8, "Password must have at least 8 characters") .max(20, "Password can't be longer than 20 characters"), confirmPassword: yup.string().required("Conform Password is required") .min(8, "Conform Password must have at least 8 characters") .max(20, "Conform Password can't be longer than 20 characters"), shopName: yup.string().required("Shop Name is required") .min(3, "Shop Name must have at least 3 characters") .max(20, "Shop Name can't be longer than 20 characters"), category: yup.string().required("Category is required"), shopAddress: yup.string().required("Shop Address is required") .min(5, "Shop Address must have at least 5 characters") .max(30, "Shop Address can't be longer than 30 characters"), countary: yup.string().required("Countary is required"), city: yup.string().required("City is required"), }); class Signup extends Component { state = { }; render() { return ( { ({ handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, values, touched, isValid, errors, }) => (
Muhalik

Create Your Acount
Mobile Number * {errors.mobile} Full Name* {errors.name} Verification Code * {errors.verificationCode} Email Address {errors.email} Password * {errors.password} Confirm Password * {errors.confirmPassword} {/* 4th Row */} Shop Name* {errors.shopName} Category * Shop Address * {errors.shopAddress} {/* End of 4th Row */} {/* 5th Row */} Countary * City *
By creating an account, you agree to Muhalik's Terms & Conditions Already have an account... Login {/* End 4th Row */}
)} ); } } const styles = { body: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.body_color}`, position: 'absolute', top: '0', left: '0', right: '0', bottom: '0', }, buttons: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, border: 'none', fontSize: '10px', }, submit_btn: { background: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, }, container: { background: 'white', // border: `0.5px solid ${GlobalStyleSheet.primry_color}`, padding: '20px 30px', margin: '5% 5%', }, label: { width: '100%', fontSize: '14px', }, fontawesome: { color: `${GlobalStyleSheet.primary_text_color}`, width: '15px', height: '15px', maxHeight: '15px', maxWidth: '15px', }, } export default Signup;
